mapper.insert: insert into pub_ordermileagecalc_log(id, orderno, obdmileage, obdgpsmileage, appmileage, lbsyunmileage, estimatedmileage, calctype, createtime, updatetime, status, optimizeobdmileage, optimizeobdgpsmileage, optimizeappgpsmileage) values(#{id}, #{orderno}, #{obdmileage}, #{obdgpsmileage}, #{appmileage}, #{lbsyunmileage}, #{estimatedmileage}, #{calctype}, now(), now(), 1, #{optimizeobdmileage}, #{optimizeobdgpsmileage}, #{optimizeappgpsmileage})
mapper.select: select pub_vehicle.id, pub_vehicle.driverid, getPlatenoStr(pub_vehicle.platenoprovince, pub_vehicle.platenocity, pub_vehicle.plateno) plateno from pub_vehicle where pub_vehicle.id = #{vehicleId} and status = 1
mapper.update: update pub_driver set gpstime = #{gpstime}, gpsspeed = #{gpsspeed}, gpsdirection = #{gpsdirection}, lng = #{lng}, lat = #{lat}, gpssource = #{gpssource}, updatetime = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into pub_drivertrack(id, driverid, gpsspeed, gpsdirection, lng, lat, createtime, updatetime, status) values(#{id}, #{driverid}, #{gpsspeed}, #{gpsdirection}, #{lng}, #{lat}, now(), now(), 1)
mapper.select: select * from pub_driver where id = #{driverid} and status = 1

select.if:
select orderno from org_order where driverid = #{id} and status = 1 and orderstatus in ("6", "7")
and starttime <= date_format(#{gpstime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and ifnull(endtime, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) >= date_format(#{gpstime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
limit 1 union select orderno from op_order where driverid = #{id} and status = 1 and orderstatus in ("6", "7")
and starttime <= date_format(#{gpstime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and ifnull(endtime, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) >= date_format(#{gpstime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
limit 1

select orderno from op_taxiorder where driverid = #{id} and status = 1 and orderstatus in ("6", "7", "9") and paymentstatus in ("0", "4", "5")
and starttime <= date_format(#{gpstime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and ifnull(endtime, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) >= date_format(#{gpstime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
limit 1

mapper.insert: insert into pub_ordergpsdata(id, orderno, deviceid, vehicleid, lng, lat, gpsdirection, gpsspeed, obdspeed, gpstime, gpssource, mileage, fuel, basestationcode, createtime, updatetime, status, gpsstatus) values(#{id}, #{orderno}, #{deviceid}, #{vehicleid}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{gpsdirection}, #{gpsspeed}, #{obdspeed}, #{gpstime}, #{gpssource}, #{mileage}, #{fuel}, #{basestationcode}, now(), now(), 1, #{gpsstatus})
mapper.select: select * from pub_ordergpsdata where timestampadd(day, 10, gpstime) < now()
mapper.insert: insert into pub_ordergpsdata_history(id, orderno, deviceid, vehicleid, lng, lat, gpsdirection, gpsspeed, obdspeed, gpstime, gpssource, mileage, fuel, basestationcode, createtime, updatetime, status, gpsstatus) values(#{id}, #{orderno}, #{deviceid}, #{vehicleid}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{gpsdirection}, #{gpsspeed}, #{obdspeed}, #{gpstime}, #{gpssource}, #{mileage}, #{fuel}, #{basestationcode}, now(), now(), 1, #{gpsstatus})
mapper.select: select latitudeoffset lat, longitudeOffSet lng from eqp_baiduoffset where latitude=floor(#{lat}*100)*10000 and longitude=floor(#{lng}*100)*10000 limit 1

select calctype, count(*) typecount from pub_ordermileagecalc_log where createtime >= date_format(#{starttime}, '%Y-%m-%d %T') and createtime <= date_format(#{endtime}, '%Y-%m-%d %T') and status = 1 group by calctype
select value from pub_dictionary where type = '里程计算短信号码' and status = 1 limit 1
